attributes.action: Call on the Government to boycott all World Economic forum policies and agenda
attributes.additional_details: Debate and discuss the agenda of the WEF it's negative impact on the rights and freedoms of UK citizens and residents, to boycott all WEF events in protest of it's goals for a one world socialist government.
attributes.background:
To openly reject the proposed Great Reset promoted by the World Economic Forum in it's entirety.
the Great Reset would have a devastating impact on the economic wellbeing and individual freedoms of UK citizens and residents.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament haven't adopted 'the Great Reset'. It's not clear from your petition what specific things you would like Government to commit not to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
